marklogic.body: I would imagine that Burning boats and docks surrounded by deep water and collapsing metal boat house roofs would be a very dangerous situation. Hats Off to the fire department for doing the best they could under such difficult circumstances. Regarding the comments about the fire boat budget cuts, I think I would be questioning that BIG RED $800,000 a year, Union driven, promotion mill called "EMS 6" before I would be questioning what type of car the fire chief drives.
